sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import StickyBox from "react-sticky-box"; import DoctorSidebar from '../sidebar'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { IMG01 } from './img'; import { EmployerContext } from "../../../context/employer"; import moment from "moment"; function EmployeeProfile() { // context values const { myEmployeeProfile, loading } = useContext(EmployerContext); const { id, photo, name, category: { ...category }, country_id, email, mobile, pref, educations, works, languages, skills, success_story } = myEmployeeProfile; const photoUrl = photo ? `http://excodeteam.com/crs/public/images/${photo}` : IMG01; return ( <>
  1. Home
  2. Jobs
  3. Single Job

Single Job

{/* start */}

{name}

{category.name}

  • {country_id}
  • {email}
  • {mobile}
{/* end */} {/* start */}

About Me

{pref}

Education

    { educations && educations.map(item => { return (

  • {item.title}

    {item.specialization}
    {`${item.from_date} - ${item.to_date}`}
    • ) }) }

Work & Experience

    { works && works.map(item => { return (

  • {item.title}

    {item.organization}
    {`${item.from_date} - ${item.to_date}`}
    • ) }) }

Languages

    { languages && languages.map(item => { return (
  • {`${item.name} (${item.level})`}
    • ) }) }

Skills

    { skills && skills.map(item => { return (
  • {item.name}
    • ) }) }
{/* end */}
); } export default EmployeeProfile;
